description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Help Guff the exploding imp destroy all the magic flowers in the fairy gardens and bring them hell! A chaotic platformer of mischievous fun. Bring destruction and carnage as you explode, hover and jump your way around multiple levels of mayhem.
description.short: Help Guff the exploding imp destroy all the magic flowers in the fairy gardens and bring them hell! A chaotic platformer of mischievous fun. Bring destruction and carnage as you explode, hover and jump your way around multiple levels of mayhem.
